summary: Exploration of learner needs for a project-based learning workshop.

learnerProfile.audience: New instructors experimenting with project-based learning

problemStatements: Learners need a replicable structure for guiding students through projects without overwhelming planning time.
Learners struggle to connect project tasks to clear assessment criteria.
opportunities: Model a simple project lifecycle with ready-to-use templates.
Surface reflection checkpoints that align to rubrics.

proposedOutline.title: Kickoff and project selection
outcomes: Frame a driving question for students

proposedOutline.title: Scaffolding milestones
outcomes: Pair formative checks with each milestone
